definition: to speak or complain about something in a loud and/or angry way
to show that you are angry by shouting or complaining loudly for a long time
a person who has rejected their religious or political beliefs
a confusing problem or question that is very difficult to solve
a question, usually involving a trick with words, that you ask for fun
the layer of muscle between the lungs and the stomach, used especially to control breathing

any thin piece of material used to separate the parts of a machine, etc.
a thin disc used to turn electronic signals into sound and sound into electronic signals in phones, loudspeakers, etc.

a piece of equipment that is part of a camera, containing one or more lenses
a contact lens (= a small round piece of thin plastic that you put on your eye to help you see better)
the clear part of the eye, behind the pupil, that focuses light so that you can see clearly
to look like or be similar to another person or thing
an eye disease involving increased pressure in the eye that makes you gradually lose your sight
a person who speaks for a group or an organization
almost correct or accurate, but not completely so
changing often and suddenly
often changing their mind in an unreasonable way so that you cannot rely on them

the event or sport of throwing a javelin as far as possible

great skill at doing something
between continents
that cannot be defended against attack or criticism
a military government that has taken power by force
affecting all parts of the world

the quality of something, such as glass, that allows you to see through it
a picture printed on a piece of film, usually in a frame, that can be shown on a screen by shining light through the film
the quality in something, such as an excuse or a lie, that allows somebody to see the truth easily
a piece of sports equipment used for hitting the ball, etc. in the games of tennis, squash or badminton. It has an oval frame, with strings stretched across and down it.
a game for two or four people, similar to squash, played with racquets and a small hard ball in a court with four walls
done secretly or kept secret

a situation where something fails or becomes weaker in a sudden or dramatic way

causing skin cells and other body tissues to become tighter
critical in a severe or clever way
slightly bitter but fresh

a feeling of doubt about a plan or an idea
an area of land in the US that is kept separate for native North Americans to live in
